name: Dark Leafy Greens
benefits: Dark green leafy vegetables are full of fiber and nutrients which may be instrumental in preventing certain chronic diseases.

name: Seaweed
benefits: Seaweed is a group of highly nutritious sea vegetables that may play a role in protecting against certain chronic diseases.

name: Mushrooms
benefits: Mushrooms are full of nutrients and may reduce your risk of certain diseases. Additionally, mushrooms are a sustainable food choice.

name: Avocado
benefits: Avocados are nutrient-rich, high-fiber fruits that may play a role in reducing inflammation and chronic diseases.

name: Garlic
benefits: Garlic is a nutrient-rich food used for its medicinal benefits for centuries. It may be useful for supporting immune function and reducing your risk of heart disease and certain cancers.

name: Green Tea
benefits: Green tea is antioxidant-rich with many health benefits including possible cancer prevention.

name: Berries
benefits: Berries are full of nutrients and antioxidants which may prevent certain diseases and improve digestion.

name: Legumes
benefits: Legumes are rich in many vitamins, protein and fiber. They may prevent some chronic diseases and support weight loss.
